english.segment1: I come to Your feet and weep. Remembering how You changed me. I kneel at Your feet humbly. I pour out my love and my thanks
english.segment2: Chorus: I am the one who's been forgiven much. I am the one who loves much
english.segment3: I sit at Your feet in peace. Sensing a smile over me. I'm here at Your feet gladly. Giving my love and my thanks
